src_text: Ge naga tsena sehleng sa Marega, Kabinete amogetše go phethwa ga Konteraka ya 400 megawatts (MW) ya mohlagase wa tlaleletšo ka Lenaneo la Kabo ya Tlwaelo leo le tla tsentšhwago mošomong pele ga mafelelo Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Njengaloku kulelive kucala kungena sikhatsi saseBusika, Ikhabhinethi iyakwemukela kuphotfulwa kweSivumelwane sema-megawatts lange-400 (MW) emandla ekusebenta langetiwe ngekusebentisa i-Standard Offer Programme lolutawuba ku-inthanethi ngembikwekuphela kwenyanga yeNkhwekhweti..

Kwengeta kuloko, Litiko Letemphilo likhetse tibhedlela letinge-213 letingeke ticishelwe gezi ngenhloso yekuwonga, bese kuba naletinge-76 tato lesetivele tikhishiwe futsi kusasetjentelwa kutsi kwengetwe letinye letinge-46 tibhedlela ngekuhamba kwesikhatsi..

src_text: Go feta fao, Kgoro ya Maphelo hlaotše dipetlele tše 213 gore di se akaretswe go kgaotšo ya mohlagase, tše 76 tša tšona di šetše di sa akaretšwe gomme mošomo wa go oketša dipetlele tše dingwe tše 46 gatetše pele..
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela kwetfulwa nje khona madvute kwe-Energy One-Stop Shop mhla tinge-31 Inkhwekhweti 2023 lokwentiwa yi-Invest SA kute kwentiwe ngekushesha tinchubo tetekulawula letitawusita tinkampani letinsha tekuphehla emandla kutsi nato titimbandzakanye.

src_text: Kabinete tšwetše pele go amogela thakgolo ye lego kgauswi ya Lebenkele la Kakaretšo la Enetši ka la 31 Mopitlo 2023 ke Invest SA go akgofiša ditshepetšo tša taolo tšeo di tlago thuša dikhamphani tše mpsha tša go tšweletša mohlagase gore di akaretšwe..
tgt_text: Iyibonile inchubekelembili lekhona eKusile Power Station kute kongeke 3 200 MW, ngekusebentisa emayunithi 1, 2, 3 na-5, kugridi yavelonkhe ekupheleni kwa-..

src_text: Kabinete amogetše kgatelopele ye dirilwego ka Seteišeneng sa Mohlagase sa Kusile ya go bušetša 3 200 MW, ka yuniting ya 1, 2, 3 le ya 5, go keriti ya bosetšhaba mafelelong .
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikhatsatekile mayelana nekuchubeka kwekusatjalaliswa kwetindzaba letingasilo liciniso, ngekusebentisa tinkhundla tekuchumana letinetinsolo letitsi khona madvute nje kutawuba nekufadalala kwegridi yavelonkhe lokutawubangela kutsi kube nekungabi khona kwagezi lonkhe lelive.

src_text: Kabinete tshwenywa ke phatlalatšo ya ditaba tša maaka ye tšwelago pele, ka bobegaditaba bja leago bjo bo latofatša go phuhlama ga keriti ya bosetšhaba wo lego kgauswi woo tlago feleletša ka kgaotšo ya mohlagase ka botlalo.
tgt_text: Ba-Eskom bacinisekise hulumende ngekutsi kunemasu lakhona lagadze kuvikela kucisha kwagezi eveni lonkhe.

src_text: Eskom netefaleditše mmušo ka maano ao lego gona ditšhireletšo tša sestemo go thibela kgaotšo ya mohlagase ya bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyaphindza icela bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi bonge gezi.

src_text: Kabinete bušeletša boipiletšo go batho ka moka ka Afrika Borwa go tšwela pele go boloka mohlagase.
tgt_text: Injongo kutsi kongiwe lokungenani 1 000 MW onkhe malanga, lokuyintfo lelingana nekonga sigaba sinye sekucisha gezi ngenhloso yekuwonga lela nalelo langa.

src_text: Nepo ke go boloka bonnyane 1 000 MW letšatši le letšatši, yeo lekanago le go boloka kgato tee ya kgaotšo ya mohlagase letšatši le lengwe le le lengwe.
tgt_text: Indvuna Yetegezi, Dkt.

src_text: Tona ya Mohlagase, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa tla begela setšhaba tshedimošo ya bjalebjale ka ga phethagatšo ya Leanotiro la Enetši ka Labohlano, la 26 Mopitlo 2023, ka kopano ya boraditaba.
tgt_text: Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, utakwatisa live ngalokusha lokumayelana nekufezekisa Lisu Lemsebenti Wetemandla ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-26 Inkhwekhweti 2023, emhlanganweni latawubamba nebetindzaba.

src_text: Mmušo hlomile komiti ya mošomo ya setegeniki, yeo etilwego pele ke Kgoro ya Bosetšhaba ya Maphelo, go araba go phulega ga kholera go la Hammanskraal ka Toropongkgolo ya Tshwane, yeo šetšego tšere maphelo 15 go fihla ka la 24 Mopitlo..
tgt_text: Hulumende usungule likomidi lemsebenti tsite leliholwa Litiko Lavelonkhe Letemphilo, macondzana nekuphendvula kulokubhedvuka kwesifo semsheko eHammanskraal edolobheni laseTshwane, lesevele sesendlule netimphilo tebantfu laba-15 ngesikhatsi kukhulunywa mhla tinge-24 Inkhwekhweti..

src_text: Mošomo wo mogolo tšwela pele go dira diteko tsa methopo ka moka ye kgonegago ya tšhilafatšo ka ba methopo ya meetse, ditanka tša go sepetša meetse, dipompi le Lenaneo la Tlhwekišo ya Meetse Ditšhila la Rooiwal (WWTW).
tgt_text: Kwentiwa umsebenti ngalokubanti kuhlola yonkhe imitfombo lengaba khona yekungcolisa emanti, kungaba yimitfombo yemanti, emaloli emathangi latfutsa emanti, timpompi kanye ne-Rooiwal Wastewater Treatment Works (i-WWTW).

src_text: Go fihla ga bjale, ga go na bohlatse bja ditwatši tša kholera bjo bo hweditšwego methopong ye, se se fa tshepo ya gore go nale kgonagalo ya gore go phulega ga kholera go ka ba go tšwa tiragalong ya tšhilafatšo yeo diregago gatee nakong ya go feta gomme ditiragalo tša bjale ke ditlamorago tša go fetetšana ka bolwetši gomme le bao ba feteditšwego le bona ba fetetša ba bangwe.
tgt_text: Kute kube ngulamuhle, kusete ligciwane lesifo semsheko lelitfolakele kulemitfombolusito, lokuyintfo lenika sibindzi sekutsi kungenteka lokubhedvuka kwalesifo semsheko kubangwe sehlakalo lesenteke nje kanye sendlula, ngaletehlakalo letikhona tingaba kutsi tibangwa kutselelana ngeligciwane kwebantfu.

src_text: Ge magato a tšwelapele, badudi ba Hammanskraal ba hlohleletšwa gore ba bediše meetse dipompi le go tšhela letswatšana pele ba nwa.
tgt_text: Njengaloku tonkhe letingenelelo tivela, bahlali baseHammanskraal bayakhutsatwa kutsi bawabilise emanti laphuma etimpompini futsi bafake kancane sawoti ngembikwekutsi bawanatse.

src_text: Go tlaleletša, mang le mang yo nago le letšhollo, go sellega goba dika tša go longwa ke mala swanetše go ya ngakeng ya gagwe goba kliniking ya tikologo ka pela.
tgt_text: Kwengeta kuloko, nanome ngubani lonetimphawu tekuhanjiswa sisu, kugonyuluka kufanele bavakashele ngekushesha dokotela nome umtfolamphilo wabo wendzawo..

src_text: Tona ya Meetse le Kelelatšhila, Morena Senzo Mchunu tla kopana le Meyara wa Toropokgolo ya Tshwane, Mokhanselara Cilliers Brink, ka Labohlano la di 26 Mopitlo 2023 ka maiteko go tšweletša leano la mohlakanelwa la tsošološo ya WWTW ya Rooiwal yeo šaletšego morago..
tgt_text: Indvuna Yetemanti Nekuhanjiswa Kwendle, Mnu.

tgt_text: Senzo Mchunu, utawubamba umhlangano naSodolobha waseDolobhenikati laseTshwane, Cllr Cilliers Brink, ngaLesihlanu mhla tinge-26 Inkhwekhweti 2023 ngemitamo yekubopha lisu ngekuhlanganyela lekuvusetela kabusha kwe-Rooiwal WWTW losekukudzala kwengcelwa sikhatsi kutsi kwentiwe..

src_text: Dipalopalo tša mešomo ya kotara ya mathomo di laetša gore mešomo ye 209 000 hlotšwe ka lekaleng la semmušo gomme mešomo ye 107 000 ka lekaleng leo sego la semmušo mo kotareng ya mathomo ya ngwaga.
tgt_text: Lena yinkhomba lecacile kutsi umnotfo waseNingizimu Afrika uyavuka uyacina ngemva kwemtselela walolo lubhubhane.

src_text: Dikamano tša Afrika Borwa le United States (US).
tgt_text: Tinombolo tekucashwa tekota yekucala tikhomba kutsi kudalwe imisebenti le-209 000 kumkhakha lohlelekile kanye nemisebenti le-107 000 kumkhakha longakahleleki ngesikhatsi sekota yekucala yemnyaka.

src_text: Kabinete netefaditše gore dikamano gare ga Afrika Borwa le US ke ye botse tiile ebile hola dinaga ka bobedi morago ga kopano gare ga Tona ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano, Ngaka Naledi Pandor le Motseta wa Amerika ka Afrika Borwa, Morena Reuben Brigety, ka ga dipolelo tša gagwe tša go latofatša gore Borwa Afrika abetše Russia dibetša.
tgt_text: Budlelwane emkhatsini weNingizimu Afrika neMelika (i-US).

src_text: Kabinete boeleditše gore dikanale tša botseta tše di tiiletšeng di hwetšagala ditšhabeng ka moka, go akaretšwa US, go hlagiša ditaba ge di tšwelela ka taolong ya dikamano tša dinagamaloko tše pedi.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ibucinisekisile budlelwano emkhatsini weNingizimu Afrika neMelika kutsi busasebuhle, busacinile futsi bunenzuzo emva kwemhlangano weNdvuna Yetebudlelwane Bemave Emhlaba Nekubambisana, Dkt.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše tsebišo ya Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ya go hlongwa ga nyakišišo ye ikemetšego go nyakišiša ditatofatšo tša kabo ya dibetša go tšwa Afrika Borwa go ya Russia.
tgt_text: Naledi Pandor neLincusa laseNingizimu Afrika eMelika, Mnu.

src_text: Dintlha ka botlalo tša nyakišišo di tla tsebagatšwa ka nako ye swanetšego.
tgt_text: Reuben Brigety, mayelana nekuphawula lokutsiwa ukwentile watsi live laseNingizimu Afrika litfumelele live laseRashiya tikhali.

src_text: Dikamano tša Afrika Borwa le Singapore.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yakusho kutsi kunetindlela tebuncusa letimisiwe kuto tonkhe tive, lokufaka ekhatsi iMelika, tekuvakalisa tingcinamba nativuka elulawulweni kwebudlelwane emkhatsini wemave lamabili.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa amogetše Tonakgolo Lee Hsien Loong wa Repabliki ya Singapore ka Labobedi, la 16 Mopitlo..
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi isemukele simemetelo lesentiwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sekusungula luphenyo lolutimele lwekuphenya letinsolo tekuphakela ngetikhali live laseRashiya yiNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Singapore ke mmeeletši yo bohlokwa ka Afrika Borwa, ka dipeeletšo tša palomoka ya go feta R5 pilione ka makaleng go swana le tšweletšo, ditirelo tša ditšhelete le thekišo ya dithoto.
tgt_text: Imininingwane yaloluphenyo itawumenyetelwa khona madvute nje..

src_text: Ditumelelano tše di saennwego gare ga dinaga tše pedi di ikemišeditše go matlafatša kgwebišano, peeletšo, tšhomišano ya thuto le tšhireletšo..
tgt_text: Budlelwane beNingizimu Afrika neSingapore.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mmotlolo wa Tlhabollo ya Selete sa Kapa Bodikela (DDM).
tgt_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa usingatse Ndvunankhulu Lee Hsien Loong waseRiphabhliki yaseSingapore ngaLesibili, mhla ti-16 Inkhwekhweti..

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa swere Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya botshelela ya DDM go la Kapa Bodikela, Mmasepaleng wa Selegae wa Drakenstein, Seleteng sa Cape Winelands, ka Labohlano, la 19 Mopitlo..
tgt_text: Live laseSingapore lingumtjalitimali lomcoka lapha eNingizimu Afrika, litjale timali letingetulu kwetigidzigidzi le-R5 emikhakheni lefananako neyekwakha imphahla, yetetimali neyemhlaba netakhiwo.

src_text: Mopresidente etile pele kemedi go tšwa maemong ka moka mararo mmušo ka fase ga kgwekgwe ye: “Se tlogele motho morago”.
tgt_text: Tivumelwane letisayiniwe emkhatsini walamave lamabili kuhloswe ngato kucinisa kuhwebelana, lutjalomali, temfundvo kanye nekubambisana kutekuvikela..

src_text: Imbizo etilwe pele ke ketelo ya Mopresidente go Tlhabollo ya Bodulo bja Batho Bjo bo Kopanyago bja Vlakkeland ya kgauswi, yeo lego tlhabollo ye kgolo ya dintlo tša setšhaba go fihla ga bjale ka Mmasepaleng wa Selegae wa Drakenstein.
tgt_text: Imbizo yaMengameli eNshonalanga Kapa YeLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukiswa kweTigodzi (i-DDM).

src_text: Tlhabollo yeo thomilego ka 2017 ge phethilwe tla fa baholegi ba ba kgotsofatšago dinyakwa dintlo tše.
tgt_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utsatse Imbizo yaMengameli i-DDM yesitfupha wayisa eNshonalanga Kapa, kuMasipala Wendzawo waseDrakenstein eSigodzini saseCape Winelands ngaLesihlanu, mhla ti-19 Inkhwekhweti..
Mengameli uhole litsimba lelivela kuyo yonkhe imikhakha lemitsatfu yahulumende ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Ungashiyi Namunye Ngemuva”.

src_text: Kago ya dintlo tše 942 mo Kgatong ya Pele a tšwela pele, dintlo tše 454 di phethilwe gomme tše 301 di sa agwa.
tgt_text: LeMbizo yendulelwe kuvakashela kwaMengameli e-Vlakkeland Catalytic Human Settlement Development lesedvute, lokuyintfutfuko yetindlu yemmango lenkhulukati kute kube ngulamuhla lekuMasipala weNdzawo waseDrakenstein.

src_text: Bohlokwa bja protšeke ye ke gore hlokomela dikgetho tša dintlo tša go fapafapana go tloga go bao ba nago le letseno la R0 go ya go R3 500 (ka fase ga Breaking New Ground), go fihla go Lenaneo la Thušo ya Motho ka Noši leo le Kgokagantšwego ka Tšhelete, go bao ba hwetšago mogolo wa gare ga R3 501 le R22 000 ka ngwaga.
tgt_text: Lentfutfuko leyacala ngemnyaka wa-2017 kutawutsi naseyiphotfuliwe inikete tindlu le-2 556 kulabo bazuzi labafanele.

src_text: Bobedi menyetla ya Dintlo tša Leago gammogo le menyetla ya Bagale ba Sešole di gona ka gare ga protšeke ye.
Ketelo ya Tlhokomedišo go Mmasepala wa Metropholithene wa eThekwini le Mmasepala wa Selete wa uMgungundlovu ka la 18 le la 19 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Kwakhiwa kwetindlu letinge-942 eSigabeni Sekucala kuyachubeka, kodvwa letinge-454 setiphotfuliwe kwatsi letinge-301 tisakhiwa.

src_text: Motlatšamopresidente Paul Mashatile boledišane le bakgathatema thutong le tlhahlong, temong, kgwebong le intastering nakong ya ketelo ya tlhokomedišo go Mmasepala wa Metropholithene wa eThekwini le Mmasepala wa Selete wa uMgungundlovu bjalo ka karolo ya diketelo tša tlhokomelo ya DDM nngwe ya diprotšeke tše bohlokwa tšeo di etetšwego bile lefelo la Protšeke ya Catalytic ya Ntshongweni, moo go agwago Smart City gare ga Durban le Pietermaritzburg.
tgt_text: Lokumcoka ngalomklamo kutsi unakekela tinhlobo letahlukahlukene tebantfu kusukela kulabo labahola R0 kuya ku-R3 500 (ngaphasi kweLuhlelo Lekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu), kusita ngeTetimali Luhlelo Lwelusitomali Loluchumene Nalowo Nalowo, kulabo labahola emkhatsini wa-R3 501 ne-R22 000 ngenyanga.

src_text: Protšeke ye tla tsošološa ikonomi ka lefelong leo, go ba le seabe go dipeeletšo tša boleng bja R15 pilione mo mengwageng ye 10 go ya go ye 15 ye tlago.
tgt_text: Omabili ematfuba eTindlu Tesibonelelo kanye nematfuba etindlu teTigayigayi Temphi akhona kulomklamo.

src_text: Mananeokgoparara Meetse.
tgt_text: Luvakasho lwekuhlola umsebenti wahulumende lwekuya kuMasipala Wasedolobheni laseThekwini nakuMasipala weSigodzi saseMgungundlovu mhla ti-18 nangemhla ti-19 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa etetše Protšeke ya Meetse ya Dinagagodimo tša Lesotho ka Labobedi, 23 Mopitlo 2023 yeo tšerego karolo moletlong wa yona wa go ribolla lekwate wa Kgato ya 2 ya protšeke.
tgt_text: Lisekelamengameli Paul Mashatile ucocisane nalabatsintsekako kutemfundvo nekucecesha, kutekulima, kutemabhizinisi nakutetimboni ngesikhatsi saloluvakasho lwekuya kuMasipala waseDolobheni laseThekwini nakuMasipala weSigodzi saseMgungundlovu njengencenye yeluvakasho lwekuhlola umsebenti wahulumende weluhlelo lwe-DDM.

src_text: Bjalo ka ge saenetšwe mengwaga ye mmalwa ye fetilego le go diegišwa, moletlo wo laeditše tšwelopele ya maitapišo a bohlokwa dinaga tše pedi.
tgt_text: Yinye yemiklamo lemcoka levakashelwe kube yindzawo yase-Ntshongweni Catalytic Project, lapho kwakhiwa khona Lidolobhakati Lesimanjemanje emkhatsini weDurban nePietermaritzburg.

src_text: Protšeke ya Meetse ya dinagagodimo tsa Lesotho bohlokwa kudu mo go kgonthišeng polokego ya kabo ya meetse ka Gauteng, Freistata, Mpumalanga, Leboa Bodikela le Kapa Leboa.
tgt_text: Lomklamo utawuvusetela imisebenti yetemnotfo kulendzawo ufake ligalelo lelilinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi leti-R15 telutjalomali eminyakeni lelishumi nale-15 letako..

src_text: Peeletšo ya mananeokgoparara meetse go kaonafatša maphelo Maafrika Borwa tšwela pele ka kabo ya go feta R14 pilione go mebasepala go rarolla tshalelonthago ya kabo ya maneokgoparara meetse, ka Thušo ya Mananeokgoparara Magolo Selete (RBIG) le Thušo ya Mananeokgoparara Ditirelo tša Meetse (WSIG).
tgt_text: Sakhiwonchanti semanti.

src_text: RBIG tla šomišwa go diprotšeke tše 130 gomme WSIG tla abelwa diprotšeke tša go feta 400 nageng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa uvakashele i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ngaLesibili,

src_text: Gape kabinete kgotsofaditšwe ke gore Kgoro ya Meetse le Kelelatšhila (DWS) gatela pele mo twantšhong ya bomenetša ka go lefelwa ga tšhelete ye nyakileng go ba R600 milione ke dikhamphani tšeo di holegilego go tšwa kamogelong ya dithendara tša go se sepetšwe ka tshwanelo.
tgt_text: mhla tinge-23 Inkhwekhweti 2023 kulokuvakasha ubese utimbandzakanya emcimbini wekugala umhlaba lapho kutawucala kwakhiwe khona umklamo weSigaba.

src_text: Kabinete lemogile gape magato taolo ya thibelo ao beilwego ke kgoro go fediša ditshenyegelo tše di sa sepetswego ka tshwanelo, tša tshenyo.
tgt_text: Kwasayinwa iminyaka leminyenti leyengca futsi kwahlangabetana nekubambeleleka, ngako-ke lomcimbi ukhombise kuphutfunyiswa kwalomtamo lomcoka emkhatsini waletive letimbili.

src_text: Sefoka sa Tšhireletšo ya Leago.
tgt_text: I-Lesotho Highlands Water Project imcoka ekucinisekiseni kutsi kuba nekuphakelwa kwemanti eGauteng, eFreystata, eMpumalanga, eNyakatfo Nshonalanga naseNyakatfo Kapa.

src_text: Afrika Borwa amogetše Sefoka sa Mekgwa ye Mebotse ya Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Tšhireletšo ya Leago (ISSA) ka go Tšhireletšo ya Leago ya Afrika 2023, seo se amogelago peeletšo ya mmušo maphelong bana ba rena, kudu bao ba tšwago malapeng bohloki le ao lego kotsing.
tgt_text: Lutjalomali lolwentiwa kusakhiwonchanti semanti lwekuphakamisa timphilo tebantfu baseNingizimu Afrika luyachubeka nekwabiwa kwetigidzigidzi letingetulu kwe-R14 kubomasipala kute kulungiswe kusilela emuva kwesakhiwonchanti semanti, ngekusebentisa i-Regional Bulk Infrastructure Grant (i-RBIG) kanye ne-Water Services Infrastructure Grant (i-WSIG).

src_text: Kgopelo ya Afrika Borwa sefokeng se sa maemo godimo be bitšwa: “Katološo ya kakaretšo ya tšhireletšo ya leago ka go nanya go bana bao ba lego kotsing: Taba ya Thušo ya Thekgo ya Bana, Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: I-RBIG itawusetjentiselwa kumiklamo le-130 bese kutsi i-WSIG yona yabelwe imiklamo lengetulu kwe-400 eveni lonkhana.

src_text: Palomoka ya dikgopelo tše 138 di amogetšwe go tšwa go ditheo tše 48 tša maloko dinageng tša go feta tše 30 ka Afrika.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yajabula kutsi Litiko Letemanti Nekuhanjiswa Kwendle selichubekele embili kakhulu ekulweni nenkhohlakalo ngobe tinkampani setibuyise cishe tigidzi leti-R600 lebetizuze ngekutfola emathenda langekho emtsetfweni.

src_text: Thušo ya rena ya leago ke lenaneo la bohlokwa la mmušo la phokotšo ya bohloki ebile le bohlokwa pušetšong ya seriti go batho ba gabo rena.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yatinaka netinyatselo tekulawula kuvikela litiko lelitibekile kute kucedvwe lusebentisomali lolungekho emtsetfweni, lolute inzuzo nalolusaphata timali.

src_text: Mokgwa wa tšhireletšo ya leago wa Afrika Borwa magareng ga mangwe magologolo lefaseng, ka bathušegi ba go feta 18 milione..

src_text: Lefelo le le Kgethegilego la Ikonomi la Namakwa (SEZ).
tgt_text: Lindiwe Zulu, kanye neNdvuna Yetebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo, Mnu Ronald Lamola, batawubamba inkhulumomphikiswano yeMavoti eSabelomali kantsi imininingwane yemhlangano wabo nebetindzaba itawukhishwa khona madvute..

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go kgethwa ga SEZ ya Namakwa ka Aggeneys ka Kapa Leboa.
tgt_text: Ivoti yeSabelomali saseHhovisi laMengameli itakwetfulwa ngaLesitsatfu, mhla tinge-31 Inkhwekhweti 2023 kantsi umhlangano nebetindzaba lomayelana neNchubekelembili neTingucuko Temumo neTichamkelo Tekucashwa letichumaniswe ngekusebentisa i-Operation Vulindlela itawubanjwa ngaLesibili, mhla tinge-30 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Kgetho ye šišintšwego dirwa go ya ka Molao wa Dilete tše di Kgethegilego tša Ikonomi, 2014 (Molao wa 16 wa 2014) le SEZ ye šišintšwego ke karolo ya Lesolo la Peeletšo ya Mopresidente.
tgt_text: Lusuku Lwe-Afrika nemgubho weminyaka lenge-20 yeNchubo Yekubuyeketana Kwabalingani YaseAfrika (i-APRM).

src_text: SEZ ya Namakwa tla bulela dikholego tša meepo, tšweletšo ya haetrotšene ye tala, tlhabollo ya mananeokgoparara, enetši ye mpshafatšegago le tshepedišo ya temo.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi kanye nabo bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika bahlanganyela nelivekati lase-Afrika nemhlaba wonkhe kugubha Lusuku Lwase-Afrika ngaLesine, mhla tinge-25 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Makala a bohlokwa kudu mo go hlomeng mešomo le mo tlhabollong ya ekonomi ya Kapa Leboa le naga..
tgt_text: Lomnyaka ubaluleke ngalokukhetsekile ngobe ngumnyaka wemgubho weminyaka lenge-60 wekusayina kwemculu wekusungulwa kweNhlangano Yelubumbano Lwe-Afrika, lihambambili leLubumbano Lwe-Afrika.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tša go feta R29 pilione di šetše di dirilwe go kgato ya mathomo ya SEZ.
tgt_text: Ingcikitsi yemigubho ya-2023 – “Kufezekisa Ngekushesha Kwendzawo Yekuhweba Ngekukhululeka kuleLivekati lase-Afrika” – kwatisa tinyatselo lesetihanjiwe ekuchubeleni embili kusebenta kwendzawo yemhlaba lenkhulu yekuhweba ngekukhululeka.

src_text: Tše di akaretša maitlamo go tšwa go Vedanta Zinc (R16 pilione), Frontier Rare Earth (R13 pilione), Hive Energy (R200 milione) le RRS Trade and Investment (R100 milione)..
tgt_text: Kugujwa kweNyanga yase-Afrika lonyaka kwenteka ngesikhatsi sinye nemgubho weminyaka lenge-20 ye-APRM, lokuhloswe ngayo kukhutsata kubusa lokuhle kulelivekati ngekusebentisa kufundza kulamanye emave ngalokuhlelekile nangekutihlola tsine njengesive matfupha

src_text: Leano la Bosetšhaba la Methopo ya Meetse Kgatišo ya Boraro (NWRS-3).
tgt_text: Tincumo Tekhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše NWRS-3 2023 gore phethagatšwe gomme leano le tlama balaodi ka moka le ditheo tšeo di phethagatšago Molao wa Bosetšhaba wa Meetse, 1998 (Molao wa 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Indzawo Yomnotfo Lokhetsekile (i-SEZ) yaseNamakwa.

src_text: Leano le le thekgwa ke tshekatsheko ya mengwaga ye meraro ya NWRS-2, yeo hlaotšego mafelo katlego le mafelo ao sa dutšego le tlhohlo..
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kucokwa kwe-Namakwa SEZ e-Aggeneys eNyakatfo Kapa.

src_text: NWRS-3 akaretša dinepo tše tharo tša merero, gore meetse le kelelatšhila di swanetše go thekga tlhabollo, phedišo ya bohloki le go se lekalekane, di na le seabe ikonoming le tlholong ya mešomo, gomme meetse swanetše go šireletšwa, go šomišwa, go hlabollwa, go hlokomelwa le go laolwa ka mokgwa wa go ya go ile le ka tekatekano.
tgt_text: Lokucokwa kwentiwa ngekulandzela Umtsetfo Wetindzawo Teminotfo Lekhetsekile, wanga-2014 (Umtsetfo Nombolo 16 wanga-2014) kantsi le-SEZ lephakanyisiwe iyincenye yeMkhankhaso WaMengameli Welutjalomali.

src_text: Leano le le dira ditšhišinyo tša go kwagala tša go oketša kabo ya meetse, go fokotša nyakego ya meetse, taolo ye šomago gabotse ya meetse le kelelatšhila, go laola lekala la meetse le kelelatšhila, go aba meetse leswa bakeng sa phetogo, go tšwetša pele tšhomišano ya boditšhabatšhaba, le go laola meetse le kelelatšhila ka fase ga maemo boso ao fetogago..
tgt_text: Le-Namakwa SEZ itawuvula inzuzo kutemnotfo letawukhicitwa ngulemayini, kukhicitwa kwehayidrojini leluhlata, kutfutfukiswa kwesakhiwonchanti, emandla lavusetelelwako nemikhicito yetekulima lesetjentiwe.

src_text: NWRS-3 phatlaladitšwe wepsaeteng ya DWS go www.dws.gov.za..
tgt_text: Lemikhakha imcoka ekudaleni imisebenti nekutfutfukisa temnotfo eNyakatfo Kapa naseveni lonkhana.

src_text: Pego ka ga Magato ao Phethagaditšwego ke Kgoro ya Tšhireletšo (DoD) go Šogana le Maitshwaro le Mekgwa ya Maloko Sešole sa Tšhireletšo ya Setšhaba sa Afrika Borwa (SANDF) ao Rometšwego go Tliša Khutšo Dinageng tša Dintwa.
tgt_text: Lutjalomali lolungetulu kwetigidzigidzi letinge-R29 seluvele lubekelwe eceleni kutsi lusetjentiselwe sigaba sekucala se-SEZ.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše pego ka ga kgatelopele yeo Afrika Borwa e dirago go šogana le maitshwaro a mangwe maloko SANDF ao rometšwego masolong go hlola khutšo go ralala le kontinente.
tgt_text: Loku kufaka ekhatsi iminikelo levela ku-Vedanta Zinc (tigidzigidzi le-R16), kubaka-Frontier Rare Earth (tigidzigidzi le-R13), kubaka-Hive Energy (tigidzi letinge-R200) nakubaka-RRS Trade and Investment (tigidzi leti-R100).

src_text: SANDF bile mothopo wa boikgantšho bja bosetšhaba ka ge tšea karolo ka go masolo go hlola khutšo ka kontinenteng go kgonthiša khutšo ka ditšhabeng tša Afrika tšeo di lego ntweng ka fase ga tlhokomelo ya Ditšhabakopano (UN)..
tgt_text: Lushicilelo Lwesitsatfu lweLisubuciko Lavelonkhe Letemitfombolusito Yemanti (i-NWRS-3) langa-.

src_text: Ka ditatofatšo tša melato ya thobalano yeo akaretšago bašireletši ba khutšo ba sešole tšeo di tšwelelago ka 2015, Sehlophatšhomo sa Tona se hlomilwe ka 2019 go nyakišiša melato ya tlaišo le tšhomišompe ya thobalano (SEA) ka gare ga DoD..
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyivumile i-NWRS-3 yanga-2023 kutsi ifezekiswe nekutsi lelisubuciko liyababopha bonkhe labasemagunyeni netikhungo letifezekisa Umtsetfo Wavelonkhe Wetemanti, wanga-1998 (Umtsetfo Nombolo 36 wanga-1998).

src_text: Kabinete kgotsofaditšwe ke sehlopha sa magato ao beilwego go šogana le ditiragalo tša SEA ka go masolo go hlola khutšo SANDF.
tgt_text: Lelisubuciko lisita lubuyeketo lweminyaka lemitsatfu lwe-NWRS-2, lolukhona kubona tindzawo lapho kube nemphumelelo khona kanye netindzawo letisanetinsayeya.

src_text: UN amogela Afrika Borwa bjalo ka mekgwa ye mekaone gape lebogile naga ka kgatelopele yeo e dirilego go fediša SEA ka go SANDF.
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 yakhiwa tinjongo tengcikitsi letintsatfu, letitsi emanti nekuhanjiswa kwendle kufanele kutsi kwesekela intfufuko, kucedvwa kwebuphuya nekungalingani, kufaka ligalelo kutemnotfo nekudala imisebenti, futsi emanti kufanele kutsi avikelwe, asetjentiswe, entiwe ncono, alawulwe futsi aphatfwe ngendlela lesimeme nangekulingana.

src_text: Kabinete gateletše gore mokgwa wa SEA ka se dumelelwe go šilafatša rekoto ye botse ya SANDF ka kontinenteng.
tgt_text: Lelisu lenta tiphakamiso letiphatsekako tekwandzisa kuphakelwa kwemanti, kunciphisa kufuneka kwemanti, kulawula ngemphumelelo kwemanti nekuhanjiswa kwendle, kulawula umkhakha wetemanti nekuhanjiswa kwendle, kusabalalisa emanti kute kube nengucuko, kukhutsata kubambisana kwemave emhlaba, kanye nekulawula emanti nekuhanjiswa kwendle ngaphasi kwesimomvama selitulu lesigucukako.

tgt_text: Umbiko ngeTinyatselo letifezekiswe Litiko Letekuvikela (i-DoD) kulungisa indlela yekutiphatsa kwemalunga eMbutfo Wavelonkhe waseNingizimu Afrika Wetekuvikela (i-SANDF) latfunyelwe etindzaweni tekugcina kuthula.

src_text: Motlatšamopresidente Mashatile tla fa polelo Letšatšing la Bosetšhaba leo ngwageng wo le tlago ketekwa ka nako ya matšatši mabedi go tloga ka la 16 go fihla ka la 17 Phupu 2023 kua Senthareng ya Dipapadi tša ka Ntle ya Mangaung, Mangaung, Bloemfontein, ka Freistata.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko lomayelana nenchubekelembili iNingizimu Afrika leyentako kulungisa indlela yekutiphatsa kwalamanye emalunga e-SANDF latfunyelwe kugcina kuthula evenikati lonkhana.

src_text: Mo matšatšing mabedi, go tla ba le sebaka sa gore baswa ba tšeye karolo dipoledišanong le Ditona, Batlatšatona le bakgathatema ba bangwe ka ga dibaka tša go fapafapana tša tlhahlo, tša kgwebo le tša tlhabollo tšeo di lego gona ka gare ga mmušo le bašomišane ba leago..

src_text: Kgwedi ya Baswa tla thakgolwa ka Labone, la 1 Phupu ke Tona ka go Kantorong ya Mopresidente ya Basadi, Baswa le Bagolofadi, Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma ka Lefelong la Segopotšo la Musiamo wa Hector Pieterson..
tgt_text: Njengaloku kwaba netinsolo temacala etemacansi letimbandzakanya bagcini bekuthula betemphi letavumbuka nga-2015, Licembu Letindvuna Lemsebenti lasungulwa nga-2019 kutsi liphenye lamacala ekuchashatwa nekuhlukunyetwa ngekwemacansi (i-SEA) ekhatsi ku-DoD..

src_text: Kabinete hlohleleditše setšhaba go matlafatša maitapišo go kgonthiša gore baswa ba hwetša menyetla yeo ba dumelelago go kgatha tema ka mafolofolo ka ikonoming.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi kuyayijabulisa kubona tinyatselo letentiwe tekulungisa tehlakalo te-SEA ku-SANDF yekugcina kuthula.

src_text: Mmušo, bjalo ka mongmošomo yo mogolo arabetše tlhokego ya tlhabollo ya mabokgoni le go fa baswa mešomo ka go kgontšha dialoga tšeo di sa šomego go hwetša maitemogelo ka Lenaneo la Dialoga tša Tirelo ya Setšhaba la go Ithutela Mošomo le go Ithuta.
tgt_text: Mhlabuhlangene ubona kutsi lolokwentiwa live laseNingizimu Afrika kuyintfo lenhle kakhulu futsi ulidvumisile ngenchubekelembili leseliyentile kususa netimphandle kuchashatwa nekuhlukunyetwa ngekwemacansi (i-SEA) ku-SANDF.

src_text: Mmušo gape phethagatša Sekhwama sa Mešomo ya Leago (SEF) le maitapišo go tsošološa go hloma mešomo Tirelo ya Baswa ya Bosetšhaba (NYS) ao gogelago baswa ba dikete ka ikonoming.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi igcizelele kutsi umkhuba we-SEA ngeke uvunyelwe kutsi ungcolise lirekhodi lelihle le-SANDF kulelivekati.

src_text: Afrika Borwa na le rekoto ye hlatselegago ya go beakanya ditiragalo tše kgolo ka katlego.

src_text: Lethabo le tšwela pele go oketšega ka matšatši go fetanyana masometshela (60) go ya go thomeng ga Sebjana sa Lefase sa Kgwele ya Diatla ka Motse Kapa go tloga ka la 28 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 6 Phato.

src_text: Le ke lekga la mathomo phadišano ye ya maemo godimo swarwa mmung wa Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go bohle go thekga lesolo la Labohlano la Kgwele ya Diatla, ka go apara diaparo tša bathekgi goba go apara mebala ya bosetšhaba go thekga sehlopha sa Bosetšhaba sa Kgwele ya Diatla sa Afrika Borwa.

src_text: KSI South Africa gape ke monggae wa Diphadišano tša Lefase tša Karati ya KSI ya bo20 ka Motse Kapa go tloga ka la 10 go fihla ka la 15 Mosegamanye 2023, gomme dikganyogo tša rena tše botse di romelwa go Team SA ge ba itokišeletša tiragalo ye ya maemo godimo ya lefase ka bophara.
tgt_text: Live leNigeria lingumlingani lomkhulu wekuhwebelana neNingizimu eNshonalanga Afrika.

src_text: The Green, Blue and No Drop Certification programmes are regulatory mechanisms of the Department of Water and Sanitation (DWS) as the water sector regulator in terms of both the National Water Act and Water Services Act, DWS.

src_text: The draft Bill aims to amend the National Small Enterprise Act (Act 102 of 1996) and provides for the establishment and registration of the Office of Small Enterprise Ombud Service.
